reviews.review_text: the formula for the tablets has changed since last year and they don't dissolve as well as they used to but it still helps to keep toilet bowls cleaner than they would without them

This does NOT make your water blue. However, it does make bubbles every time you flush, much like urine bubbles that don't go down. it does help to keep the toilet clean. (Less scrubbing). Each tablet lasts about 2 weeks (for me). It depends on how many people in your household. The instructions says don't handle tablet with bare hands, yet the packaging is difficult to open. Either wear gloves when tearing open the pouch or use scissors to cut open the pouch first. Tearing it open is not that easy.

reviews.title: Where's the Bleach?
reviews.review_text: The price was great, about half the cost of my usual Clorox. When I opened the wrapper, there was no hint of bleach smell; within a week the bowl was dirty again and the tablet had become a tiny puddle of gel. We've never had issues with Great Value products, but this one didn't work for us.

reviews.title: horrible product
reviews.review_text: horrible product, it only smells to bleach for like 3 flushes , it stop smelling or doing anything . I got curious of why it stopped working just to see a giant swollen sticky thing in the bottom of the tank, I pull it out , (wich was very gross) and I noticed it didn't smell to anything just like plastic, I just throw it in the trash and the new ones too. I guess I should had pay a little more and buy the authentic bleach tablets from the original brand

reviews.title: Goop and mold
reviews.review_text: These are terrible!! I've purchased numerous Grear Value brands before and they're normally comparable to name brand, but these are GARBAGE! I deep cleaned all our toilets (we have 3) and added one of these “tablets” After a couple hours and flushing, the water would be foamy. Over a week, the “tablet” in the tank turned into a pile of goop. Mold began to accumulate inside the bowl! I just cleaned the toilets literally only a week ago! I had been an avid user of the Clorox Bleach tablets and will definitely be going back. The only time I would get mold in the toilet is when the tablet ran out. Save your money.

reviews.title: BE WARNED!
reviews.review_text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS! It turns into a gelatinous goo in your tank. It caused so many issues it was unbelievable. My husband was able to fix the problems (in all three toilets!) but what about people who aren't handy? Plumbers must love products like this! Walmart was out of the Clorox brand so I bought these. I won't use products like this ever again after doing a quick web search and seeing how bad all of them are for toilets.

reviews.title: Horrible!
reviews.review_text: Horrible, horrible product. Becomes a blob in the toilet tank that I had to fish out of 2 tanks. Mold started to form in my tank 2 days after dropping these in. There isn't even the faintest smell of bleach. Zero cleaning power. Total waste of money. Read the other negative reviews. Stick with the well known brand for bleach tablets.

reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
reviews.review_text: I got this brand instead of the Clorox brand to save some money. I did save money but these drop ins DO NOT work at all. They just made a gel where it settled in my toilet tank that I had to clean out before I could replace with the Clorox ones I usually buy.

reviews.title: Complete Mess!
reviews.review_text: Horrible product—formula has changed. This used to be a great product, I've used them for years. The product has changed in the worst possible way. It doesn't dissolve properly in the tank, it just festers and turn into a useless mess that you have to empty the tank and clean out the mess—will not buy again!

reviews.title: Terrible product—don't waste your money
reviews.review_text: This product is worthless. It used to be good, but they changed the formula and now it is terrible. It does not help my toilet stay clean. It doesn't dissolve like the old tablets used to—the best way I can describe how it looked after a couple of days was like it was melting. It disappeared quickly and did nothing to help clean the toilet. It's worthless and I will be purchasing a different brand from now on.

reviews.title: Great item
reviews.review_text: This product is a must have and must use. It works very well and easy to use, cut open bag drop the tablet away from the plunger and it takes care of the smell, stains and bowl. It lasts 30 days based on usage from my experience.

reviews.title: Liked the old bleach tablets far better
reviews.review_text: These tablets have changed in size - too big and need to be broken for use. They are also no longer made of the same material and feel soapy/waxy. will not purchase again

reviews.title: FAKE!
reviews.review_text: THESE ARE FAKE! These are nothing more than compressed paper! No cleaning agent in them WHAT-SO-EVER! A TOTAL SCAM! Walmart should IMMEDIATELY discontinue this product. This kind of rip off will ruin Walmart's reputation!!

reviews.title: Didn't work as promised
reviews.review_text: The tablet completely dissolved within 2 days. I bought this product before and it stayed in tablet form until it was gone. This just let a huge blob of goo in my toilet tank.

reviews.title: Turns to goo and stops cleaning
reviews.review_text: I've bought this before and it worked, but the last batch the items just turned to goo and they don't disinfect the toilet anymore after the first few days. Then you're stuck with this big gooey blob in the bottom of your tank.

reviews.title: Tablets No Longer the Same
reviews.review_text: This product used to be good. It has changed. No longer small, very compacted tablets, they have changed to large, very porous tablets that turn to mush within 2-3 days. Tablets used to last about a month. Now, less than a week and they're already a gelled blob. Very disappointing.

reviews.title: Use if you enjoy washing your toilet frequently!!
reviews.review_text: I've bought these tablets before and it used to work great, but something changed. The tablets are larger and don't smell like bleach. After a few flushes, it leaves a foamy layer in the bowl water and soon the toilet turns brownish gray below the water line. I'm washing the toilet way more than I ever had to!! The tablet in tank becomes a difficult to remove glob!! This product is absolutely horrible now!!

reviews.title: Low Price
reviews.review_text: I don't have anything to compare it to as far as length of use. I like the low price compared to others, even if I have to add one a little more often (again, I don't know the length of use for others, and I am not tracking the length of use on this item either).

this product is awful. it forms a hard gel like bubble in the tank that is difficult to get rid of it just sits there and does nothing until I scrob at it with toilet brush and then it is nearly impossible to get off the toilet brush. it does not compare with brand name at all.

reviews.title: These toilet tablets don't work
reviews.review_text: I purchased this toilet cleaner because I have purchased the bleach tablets for years. When I didn't see my toilet bowl becoming any cleaner, and I didn't smell any bleach, I looked in the tank. There was a blob where I had placed the tablet. I took the blob out of my toilet tank and threw it in the garbage. They're useless

reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
reviews.review_text: DO NOT BUY! I would give it zero stars if I could. I usually buy Clorox brand bleach tablets but bought these due to them being cheaper in price. They ruined our toilets! They turned into a gooey, gel blob that coated our toilet bowls with gel that dirt stuck to! Do yourself a favor and buy the name brand. I had to clean my toilets more often with these and finally figured out why!

reviews.title: Stick with the name brand
reviews.review_text: Great value has always been a great value for me. This bleach toilet tab is the exception. It turns into a giant blob in the back of the toilet. I had my reservations when I opened the package as it had a different look and feel of the Clorox brand. But I gave it a try anyway. In addition to the giant blob it does not keep the toilet bowl fresh and within a few days of using it saw a difference in how clean my toilet bowl was not.

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.review_text: These used to be as good as the Clorox tabs. Now you drop them in and they turn to gel that does not dissolve. They no longer clean and no bleach smell like they use to have. Absolutely junk. My guess is GV is using a different supplier as the box does not say new and improved. They Just packed this crap in a box and since it has the GV label no one cares.

reviews.title: Waste Of Money
reviews.review_text: Don't listen to the paid reviews that say "[This review was collected as part of a promotion.]" I don't know what they've done, but these aren't the same anymore. Used to use them all the time, but now they just turn into a blob in your tank that sits there and does nothing. Cleaning action stopped after a few days at best. After a week I tried stirring up the blob only to find it stuck to the bottom of the tank. And the gel gets under the flapper and causes issues. I'm going to have to drain the tank and scrub the rest of it out. Complete waste of money.

reviews.title: Total Waste of Money!!
reviews.review_text: I would give these a negative star if I could, they're totally worthless, do not waste your money. Instead of slowly dissolving into the water like they should, they just absorb water and grow into a big mass of goo and never do anything to keep the toilet clean.

I didn't read the reviews because I've purchased this many times in the past. So now in reading the reviews, I see that it wasn't a fluke, the toilet bowl water is foamy and cloudy, and in the tank it's a big blob of gel. I will purchase a name brand from now on.

reviews.title: WILL NO LONGER BUY
reviews.review_text: They changed the product. I've used these tablets for years, because of the price and they did the job. Whatever they did, the tablets no longer clean as effectively, or last as long. The product foams, but that doesn't make it any better. I will be buying the higher priced product in the future.

reviews.title: Used to be great, now horrible.
reviews.review_text: Seems they changed formula or this a defective batch. Used to last months per tablet, these a few days.

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.review_text: Worst product ever, turns to a thick slime ball and won't allow the shut off valve to close. Don't buy this.

reviews.title: does not do the job
reviews.review_text: It does not keep the mold killed. Their competitors do a much better job even though they are higher.
Each tablet lasts 2-3 weeks in a toilet thats flushed about 5 times a day. it serms like they used to last a month, or more.

reviews.title: They work great !!!!
reviews.review_text: I love these. and they keep the toilet bowl clean with every flush... Does not stain the tank or bowl... I recommend using them A rating
was just a blob 2 days after putting it in. does not smell like it has any bleach. Moldy ring in the toilet.

reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
reviews.review_text: Great price for the bundle. That last a decent amount of time and so the job to keep the bowl fresher for a little longer.

reviews.title: What happened to these?
reviews.review_text: These used to be great. Now they don't last very long and dissolve into a gel mess that doesn't clean like the old formula.

reviews.title: Less crappy
reviews.review_text: this definitely makes the crapper less crappy. i'll take the smell of cleanliness over nasty bathroom smells. I only wish there were more tablets.

This is just disintegrating almost immediately and it is not working like it used to. I am right away getting a brown ring in my toilet. I tried to complain via email to the manufacturer but no response. I don't recommend!
This firm tablet turned into a gel mess and was eating away the rubber gasket. The toilet started leaking and we had to replace the entire toilet. So... NO, I cannot recommend this product!

reviews.title: Dissolved to quickly
reviews.review_text: I have used these for years but the last box I purchased dissolved into a pile of mush overnight. They used to last almost a month.

reviews.title: Don't waste your money
reviews.review_text: They changed the formula. It doesn't clean as good and is a very mushy consistency when in the tank. I do not recommend this new version.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: Used to be as good as Clorox version but now they just turn into a gelatinous blob that sits in the tank. You're better off using nothing. Why did they change the formula?

reviews.title: Awesome Product!
reviews.review_text: Love this product .. never without it. Keeps bowl CLEAN till it desolves. Only have to scrub bowl 2 or 3 times in a whole month! MUCH CHEAPER than name brand.. works just as good and you get more!

reviews.title: Formula change?
reviews.review_text: There must've been a formula change, as these used to be great tablets that got the job done. Now it just turns into a giant glob sitting in the tank, not doing any cleaning. Very disappointing!

reviews.title: Another Good Product Changed
reviews.review_text: Have been using these tablets for years. The last ones I bought are totally different. Don't work as well, no bleach smell after flushing the toilet. Also, do not last as long. Very disappointing.

I like to keep my toilet bowls cleaned and bacteria free. These great value brand does the job. we have 3 toilets in our house and I'm a little bit OCD about keeping the bathrooms clean and the dishes washed.

reviews.title: Horrible product now that it has different ingredi
reviews.review_text: These tablets DO NOT work. Toilet bowl got moldy ring around top of water in bowl just as if I had not used anything. This new formulation is awful. Bring back the old formulation please

reviews.title: The worst bleach tablets
reviews.review_text: Please don't buy!! The worst product ever! It's a sticky big foam that doesn't smell!! They gotta take this product out!!! Report this product!!! Take off shelves please!!!!!!

reviews.title: They changed to a less powerful product.
reviews.review_text: This product has changed since I first started using it. Before my most recent purchase you could smell the bleach whenever you flushed the toilet but now nothing and the size of the disks has changed as well, they are bigger but I don't think they are as strong as they were before. I'll know more after the first disk has fully dissolved but I don't expect the same results as I have has with these before, only time will tell.

I discovered these about 5 years ago and I cannot live without them you never really have to clean your toilet but I do anyway keeps the tank smelling fresh and clean I love them they're a little expensive maybe not as expensive as the other brand but still they've gone up a couple of dollars. if they keep getting more expensive I guess I'll have to revert to my daily toilet washing

reviews.title: Works as designed
reviews.review_text: These work nicely. There is a blob at the bottom of the tank (there is no way that would ever stay in tablet shape) but it is getting smaller over time. There is a faint odor of bleach which is what I wanted - it means the tablet is doing the job it was designed to do.

reviews.title: Formula changed! These are HORRIBLE!
reviews.review_text: I have bought the great value brand toilet tabs for years on end, and they have been great functionally as well as being a better price point than the name brands. I purchased a new box several weeks ago and realized the box looks the same but the content packaging and size of the tablets has changed. They are most definitely NOT the same product I've always received. Skip to today when I realized the toilets in the house were already starting to have a film and form rings. This only ever used to happen when the tablet dissolved completely. Now it's happening before it's dissolved, AND it is creating cloudy water in the tank and bubbles as it flushes. I noticed that a couple weeks ago and was confused but at the time didn't connect the two. The formula HAS TO GO BACK TO THE OLD FORMULA. THESE ARE ABSOLUTE TRASH! I will be looking elsewhere for these now. Absolutely the worst product change I have ever witnessed with my own eyes! They do not work anymore!

reviews.title: Do not purchase this product!
reviews.review_text: I have been buying this product for a long time. And it always worked great. They recently changed the formula and now it is HORRIBLE! It turns into a gummy mess at the bottom of the toilet tank and doesn't dissolve. There is no smell of bleach. It's not a good value because it does nothing. Please don't waste your money.

reviews.title: TRASH
reviews.review_text: I bought these thinking the last ones I had were some other knockoff as they were not very bleachy and turned to mush after about a week. When I opened the film, I realized they were the same ones but used it anyway thinking I may had just gotten a bad batch. These are identical. Nothing on box about a new formula(probably because it's a formula I wouldn't advertise as new or improved). I will NOT buy again and will look to get refund

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.review_text: These bleach tablets don't dissolve well with water whereas the premium brand's tablets dissolve perfectly well. These Great Value tablets leave a mysteriously milky puddle in the water, at the bottom of the water tank. That puddle has to be agitated with a brush for it to clear when the tank is flushed. The toilet bowl is dirty when the milky puddle is still in the water tank. What a waste of money. Great Value's bleach tablets used to be good. Then they went away for a while, at least from our store, and when they returned the product seems to have changed.

reviews.title: unbelievably awful
reviews.review_text: Literally awful. Turned into a ball of mush instantly. After 1 month it is still a blob in my tank. It did not clean the bowl at all. Stll have a ring around my bowl. I still have to scrub once a week. No bleach in this tab whatsoever. Does absolutely nothing. Do not buy! Give everyone their money back.

reviews.title: Used to work
reviews.review_text: Ive bought these for a couple years but now they must be a different formula. The tablet turned into a rubbery blob that wont disolve unless I take my brush and scrape at it every few days. Its stuck to the bottom so I cant get it out. Toilet is mildew ringed after a few days, like theres no tablet at all. Stick with Clorox brand.

reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
reviews.review_text: After giving my toilet a good manual scrub, I followed the instructions on the box. Three weeks later, it does not seem to work at all. My toilet still generates pink stains from where the water from the tank is expelled on the sides of the bowl. The toilet tank looks as dirty as when I first dropped the tablet in. I am returning the product for a refund.

reviews.title: Fell off...
reviews.review_text: I don't know what happened to the things they used to be great. They were a hard as bricks. If you clanked two of them together, they'd sound like two stone pavers. They literally would not break. Very sturdy tablets. AND they had a super strong bleach smell. Now...they are soft like they've been exposed to humidity or moisture. They crumble from the pack and dissolve almost instantly. No bleach smell whatsoever. At first, I thought I just got a bad batch because I ordered online and received them via shipping. That was about a month ago. So, I decided to go in-store to pick up a box. It's the same crumby crud! I guess they changed manufacturers or something. Walmart, if you did, please go back to your original maker of these because they are absolutely trash now.
they are huge, so I don't need to buy as many anymore!
It seems to be helping with the problem of the ring in the toilet. It was driving me crazy.

reviews.title: Does the job!
reviews.review_text: Have used these for years. They do the job. No scent or color. Just drop into the tank.

reviews.title: Works goid
reviews.review_text: These work not quite as good as Clorox brand but they are much cheaper.
Dissolves in less than 10 days. I'll stick with the name brand.
Never changes and is a viable option for those on a smaller budget.
Bought what I found to be a great item at a very good price.
these still work ok but I prefer the old formula which seemed to have more bleach
